on the passing of time
  • about

rocking in the dark

floating boat

siding road

phoning streets

flying cars

riding tram

lighting sophia

windowseeing sights

hailing water

riding piggyback

sharing table

rolling bike

framing horseshoe

waiting boats

storing well

picking over the stars

gazing through the gate

walking down the arch

going through the tunnel

staring at the mural

stoping by a door

eating snails

sitting on the shore

bathing on the seaside

peeping an old theatre

heading pass the church

wobbling along the road

inhaling the view

piling up wood

climbing the hill

strolling the market

watching olives

rambling along up the street

keeping loud in mind

letting it out

wierd

  • on the passing of time
